languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every stack of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the Master Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} (rounded up).
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} усиливает свою следующую атаку, чтобы нанести +4% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} за каждый уровень тактического преимущества мастера-тактика. При этом мастер-тактик теряет половину уровней тактического преимущества с округлением вверх.

traits.locale_text: The Tactician empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional Damage for every stack of Tactical Advantage the Tactician has, and loses half of the stacks of Tactical Advantage (rounded up).
The Tactician empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional Damage for every stack of Tactical Advantage the Tactician has, and loses half of the stacks of Tactical Advantage (rounded up).
The Tactician empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional damage for every stack of Tactical Advantage the Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of Tactical Advantage (rounded up).

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every stack of tactical advantage the Master Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} усиливает свою следующую атаку, чтобы нанести +4% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} за каждый уровень {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактического преимущества{/g} мастера-тактика. При этом мастер-тактик теряет половину уровней {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактического преимущества{/g} с округлением вверх.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every stack of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the Master Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} (rounded up).

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} усиливает свою следующую атаку, чтобы нанести +4% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} за каждый уровень {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактического преимущества{/g} мастера-тактика. Тактик усиливает свою следующую атаку, чтобы нанести +4% дополнительного урона за каждый уровень Тактического преимущества тактика. При этом тактик теряет половину уровней Тактического преимущества с округлением вверх.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}每有1层{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数，下次攻击就会造成4%的额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，随后战术专家失去一半的{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数（向上取整）。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every stack of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the Master Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} (rounded up).

traits.locale_text: 战术专家每有一层战术优势，下次攻击就会造成4%的额外伤害，随后战术专家失去一半的战术优势层数（向上取整）。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} potencia su próximo ataque para que inflija un +4 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional por cada acumulación de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g} que tenga, y pierde la mitad de sus acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g} (redondeando hacia arriba).
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every stack of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the Master Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} (rounded up).

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} potencia su próximo ataque para que inflija un +4 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional por cada acumulación de Ventaja táctica que tenga, y pierde la mitad de sus acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica (redondeando hacia arriba).

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} stärkt seinen nächsten Angriff, wodurch er für jeden Stapel von {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Taktischer Vorteil{/g} des Meistertaktikers +4 % zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht. Dafür verliert er die Hälfte seiner Stapel von {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Taktischer Vorteil{/g} (aufgerundet).
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every stack of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the Master Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} (rounded up).

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} stärkt seinen nächsten Angriff, sodass er für jeden Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil des Meistertaktikers +4 % zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt. Dafür verliert er die Hälfte seiner Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil (aufgerundet).

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} renforce sa prochaine attaque pour qu'elle inflige +4 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires par cumul d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g}, et il perd la moitié de ses cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur).
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every stack of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the Master Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} (rounded up).

traits.locale_text: Le Tacticien booste son attaque suivante pour qu'elle inflige +4 % de dégâts supplémentaires par cumul d'Avantage Tactique, et il perd la moitié de ses cumuls d'Avantage Tactique (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}が次の攻撃を強化し、および戦術家に付与されている戦術的優位のスタック1ごとに+4%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるようになる。ただし、戦略の達人は戦術的優位のスタックを半分（切り上げ）失う。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every stack of tactical advantage the Master Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}が次の攻撃を強化し、および戦術家に付与されている戦術的優位のスタック1ごとに+4%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるようになる。ただし、戦略の達人は戦術的優位のスタックを半分（切り上げ）失う。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g}, bir sonraki saldırısını sahip olduğu her {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi için +%4 ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verecek şekilde güçlendirir ve {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikiminin yarısını kaybeder (yukarı yuvarlanır).
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} empowers their next attack to deal +4% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every stack of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the Master Tactician has, and loses half of their stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} (rounded up).
